TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Dakan-ecu, title = Dakan-ecu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dakan-ecu} }

S.FORM: == Dakan-ecu達斡爾族 == Dakan-ecu, nakamuan u Dakan-eyi, nu Mungku binacadan, tatapangan a tuas nuheni u Cidan-zen, u Cunha-minkuo kunhe-kuo nu adidiay a binacadan, tada angangangan nikakenihan itida i Mungku kitidaan a Hulun-piae-se Muoli-tawa Dakan-ecu niyadu'an atu Hialun-censen Cici-haese Mialise- Dakan-ecu a kitidaan, adidi' ku muenengay i Sincin-tacen. kakenihan i E'luose, pilecadan nu kitidaan a E'luose u Dakan-liya " Даурия", u Waypiaycia-e. . likisi歷史 kakungkuan nu Dakan-ecu, yu cacay a lasubuan nu pina a mihcaan, cacaya a hitayan nu Cidan misangan tu aenengan, eneneng satu itida. nina hitay a sakakaay ci Sacie-dihan, u Dakan nu daduducan a tuas. idaw ku siace musakamuay " Dakan" u Cidan " Tahe" ngangan, Tahe a ngalngalan. ayda nipikinkiwan tu DNA nakamuan tu sumamaday nu mapataya a tataynaan nu Cidan atu nu aydaay a Dakane, E'wenke', Mungku-cu atu Hancu tu idang nipilecadan mikinkiwan tu binacadan, sakamusa tu labuay nu Cunkuo a binacadan, Dakane-cu atu Cidan sinikalecadan nuheni tu taasan, u iluc nu Cidan a tademaw sa. .而現代DNA . caynem-caynem mihcaan Nueha-ce' u ngangan Han han. sakatusa a mihcaan midebung tu Hailun-cin tebang nu kitidaan a Saha-linpu, tawya a Dakane atu kitidaan nu niyadu' u Sahalin "ᠰᠠᡥᠠᠯᡳᠶᠠᠨ" sahaliyan, Mamyi nipanganganan tu Hialun-cin a nganganan, u picedekan nu sapatata' a nganganan nu Saha-eca " ᠰᠠᡥᠠᠯᠴᠠ, sahalca, imi nu Mamyi u Hiadiaw" niyadu'an, atu nu E'wenke' nipanganganan tu Suolunpu. 1616 , sahaliyan, , sahalca, . caysip a seci nu ayawan nu cuoye, Daekan-zen kakenihan i Waysin- anlin timulan nu Cinci-licin " aydaay nu labu nu E'luose Ciya-he" Heku atu walian nu Niwmang-cin "aydaay nu labu nu E'luose Pu'leiya-he", nutipan katukuh i Sele'-ke'he nu Hialun-cin amisa nu dadipasan a tepatepadan. 17 . E'kuo tademaw itida i caynem-limsep mihcaan katuku i Ceaya-he nu kitidaan, makaadih ku nuhenian tu nika lekalan nu sakayliwmah, E'kuo mianin tu nuhenian mialaw tu banuh banges nu kalisiwan, nika pasayda ku nuheni i Sunce pabeli tu kalisiw, sisa kaiyan nuheni patahekal, pacicien ku nuheni mabulaw taydan i Nencin kitidaan. . Cindin-liwcinyun sanse sakamusa tu Dakane " Tahe, tahue", "Tacawe" Dahue. Cinday Sincen a Dadane-cu namaka Suolunpu sapangangan u Suoluncu, pabulawan tu adidaay nu tademawan taydan i Sincin-tacen kitidaan misebeng i bukebukelaan. . Caysiw-lucay mihcaan debungan nu Dipun ku Cunkuo wali amisan nu kitidaan, miwawies ku Daekun-cu milebu tu nuhenian. Caysiw-limlu mihcaan, sakamusa ninabinacadan mangalay pataluma' tu nuudip a binacadan nu nganganan, sisa palecad hantu Dakane. 1931 . sakayliwmah農業 tada kaluk ku kawaw nu Dakane, alahican miadup ku kawaw nuheni, manamuh tu "kucim a belacan" hinapalamel i buling tu akutiaay nu hemayan atu buling nu mugiyan a walay, piyang. buling atu nimelecan tu basis a mugian sipalamel i aam kanamuhan nu babalaki a kakanen. lami' hantu idaw ku "waci sawada' nu pabuy", " hannu limaen mikamel ku basis", " kunpile' liwkawya", manamuh mutabaku, minanum tu ucia atu epah. tanayuay nu tenliw ku nikuc, sitatelecan ku tatami, tatayna han nai' ku tateleca. hinasikad tu babalaki, halitademaw ku tapang nu luma'. . Dakane binacadan sumamad ni palumaan tu kakanen a tuudan idaw ku Cice, Ciwmay, kupkup u tabakiay nu umahan ku papalumaan, kakanen tu hemay wadayan atu papah nu tabaku tida i bawbawbian a paluma'. yadah kunipahabay tu subayuan nu Dakanecu u sasalamaan mikacaw a subayu atu sakay kelakelaan ku duma, sakayliwmah han u katalan ku malukay. . pahutin hananay ku subayu nuheni caay papiungen inai' ku mikacaway, Dakane binacadan idaw namin ku nipahabay tu pinaay a katalanan u kakanen tu buling ku yadahay, inai' ku pacakaya tu bulingbuling aca. tidaay a binacadan pahabay henay tu pabuy atu tulakuk, caay pahabay tu taduk, gaciw. nipalumaan nu binacadan tu papah nu tabaku han anu tadayadah caay kamin a cuhcuhen sa sipacakay ku duma a tatabakuan. . palutatengaan atu lisin 宗教與習俗 mihmihcaan tu cacaya a bulad tu caynem a demiad u sapala'cu a demiadan picidekan nu binacadan a demiadan, nu dumaan a sakalimulan a demiadan milecad tu layak a sikawaw, idaw ku pisiwgacuan, tasa a bulad tusa a demiad, pilincunan sa, nika limulakan a dimiada idaw ku caaya pilecad tu kalimulakan. sakay taleacawaan cacay ku tatama cacay ku tatayna, caay ka palemangsa a mikikung, caay pakasiacawa tu babalaki ku sasaacawaan. .

== Dakan-eco達斡爾族 == Dakan-eco, nakamoan o Dakan-eyi, no Mongko binacadan, tatapangan a toas noheni o Cidan-zen, o Conha-minkoo konhe-koo no adidiay a binacadan, tada angangangan nikakenihan itida i Mongko kitidaan a Holon-piae-se Mooli-tawa Dakan-eco niyado'an ato Hialon-censen Cici-haese Mialise- Dakan-eco a kitidaan, adidi' ko moenengay i Sincin-tacen. kakenihan i E'loose, pilecadan no kitidaan a E'loose o Dakan-liya " Даурия", o Waypiaycia-e. . likisi歷史 kakongkoan no Dakan-eco, yo cacay a lasoboan no pina a mihcaan, cacaya a hitayan no Cidan misangan to aenengan, eneneng sato itida. nina hitay a sakakaay ci Sacie-dihan, o Dakan no dadodocan a toas. idaw ko siace mosakamoay " Dakan" o Cidan " Tahe" ngangan, Tahe a ngalngalan. ayda nipikinkiwan to DNA nakamoan to somamaday no mapataya a tataynaan no Cidan ato no aydaay a Dakane, E'wenke', Mongko-co ato Hanco to idang nipilecadan mikinkiwan to binacadan, sakamosa to laboay no Conkoo a binacadan, Dakane-co ato Cidan sinikalecadan noheni to taasan, o iloc no Cidan a tademaw sa. .而現代DNA . caynem-caynem mihcaan Noeha-ce' o ngangan Han han. sakatosa a mihcaan midebong to Hailon-cin tebang no kitidaan a Saha-linpo, tawya a Dakane ato kitidaan no niyado' o Sahalin "ᠰᠠᡥᠠᠯᡳᠶᠠᠨ" sahaliyan, Mamyi nipanganganan to Hialon-cin a nganganan, o picedekan no sapatata' a nganganan no Saha-eca " ᠰᠠᡥᠠᠯᠴᠠ, sahalca, imi no Mamyi o Hiadiaw" niyado'an, ato no E'wenke' nipanganganan to Soolonpo. 1616 , sahaliyan, , sahalca, . caysip a seci no ayawan no cooye, Daekan-zen kakenihan i Waysin- anlin timolan no Cinci-licin " aydaay no labo no E'loose Ciya-he" Heko ato walian no Niwmang-cin "aydaay no labo no E'loose Po'leiya-he", notipan katokoh i Sele'-ke'he no Hialon-cin amisa no dadipasan a tepatepadan. 17 . E'koo tademaw itida i caynem-limsep mihcaan katoko i Ceaya-he no kitidaan, makaadih ko nohenian to nika lekalan no sakayliwmah, E'koo mianin to nohenian mialaw to banoh banges no kalisiwan, nika pasayda ko noheni i Sonce pabeli to kalisiw, sisa kaiyan noheni patahekal, pacicien ko noheni mabolaw taydan i Nencin kitidaan. . Cindin-liwcinyon sanse sakamosa to Dakane " Tahe, tahoe", "Tacawe" Dahoe. Cinday Sincen a Dadane-co namaka Soolonpo sapangangan o Soolonco, pabolawan to adidaay no tademawan taydan i Sincin-tacen kitidaan misebeng i bokebokelaan. . Caysiw-locay mihcaan debongan no Dipon ko Conkoo wali amisan no kitidaan, miwawies ko Daekon-co milebo to nohenian. Caysiw-limlo mihcaan, sakamosa ninabinacadan mangalay pataloma' to noodip a binacadan no nganganan, sisa palecad hanto Dakane. 1931 . sakayliwmah農業 tada kalok ko kawaw no Dakane, alahican miadop ko kawaw noheni, manamoh to "kocim a belacan" hinapalamel i boling to akotiaay no hemayan ato boling no mogiyan a walay, piyang. boling ato nimelecan to basis a mogian sipalamel i aam kanamohan no babalaki a kakanen. lami' hanto idaw ko "waci sawada' no paboy", " hanno limaen mikamel ko basis", " konpile' liwkawya", manamoh motabako, minanom to ocia ato epah. tanayoay no tenliw ko nikoc, sitatelecan ko tatami, tatayna han nai' ko tateleca. hinasikad to babalaki, halitademaw ko tapang no loma'. . Dakane binacadan somamad ni palomaan to kakanen a toodan idaw ko Cice, Ciwmay, kopkop o tabakiay no omahan ko papalomaan, kakanen to hemay wadayan ato papah no tabako tida i bawbawbian a paloma'. yadah konipahabay to sobayoan no Dakaneco o sasalamaan mikacaw a sobayo ato sakay kelakelaan ko doma, sakayliwmah han o katalan ko malokay. . pahotin hananay ko sobayo noheni caay papiongen inai' ko mikacaway, Dakane binacadan idaw namin ko nipahabay to pinaay a katalanan o kakanen to boling ko yadahay, inai' ko pacakaya to bolingboling aca. tidaay a binacadan pahabay henay to paboy ato tolakok, caay pahabay to tadok, gaciw. nipalomaan no binacadan to papah no tabako han ano tadayadah caay kamin a cohcohen sa sipacakay ko doma a tatabakoan. . palotatengaan ato lisin 宗教與習俗 mihmihcaan to cacaya a bolad to caynem a demiad o sapala'co a demiadan picidekan no binacadan a demiadan, no domaan a sakalimolan a demiadan milecad to layak a sikawaw, idaw ko pisiwgacoan, tasa a bolad tosa a demiad, pilinconan sa, nika limolakan a dimiada idaw ko caaya pilecad to kalimolakan. sakay taleacawaan cacay ko tatama cacay ko tatayna, caay ka palemangsa a mikikong, caay pakasiacawa to babalaki ko sasaacawaan. .
